text: The Luxembourg Football Federation (; , FLF; ) is the governing body of football in Luxembourg. The association organizes the Luxembourg national football team and the Luxembourg Football League. It is based in Mondercange. The current president is Paul Philipp, since 2004. The association was founded on 22 November 1908. In 1910, it became a member of FIFA. In 1954, it became a member of UEFA. == Other websites == * Luxembourg Football Federation official website * Luxembourg at FIFA site * Luxembourg at UEFA site Category:1908 establishments in Europe Category:20th-century establishments in Luxembourg Category:Football in Luxembourg Category:Organizations based in Luxembourg Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe
title: Luxembourg Football Federation
